title: Smart Science and Future Educational Technology Trends Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific terminology understanding and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Mobile device utilization in BYOD environments, facilitating panel discussion-based collaborative learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental concepts of educational technology trends (smart learning environments, learning analytics, AI applications).
Learners can demonstrate how to apply digital tools to scientific problem-solving processes using mobile devices.
Learners develop the ability to comparatively analyze domestic/international educational technology cases through peer discussions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
